title: The Lost City
author: Rosa Delgado
summary: Deep in the Amazon jungle, eleven-year-old Sofia follows her archaeologist grandmother's old map to a city that shouldn't exist.

pages.text:
Sofia found the map inside her grandmother's favorite book. It was folded into a tiny square, tucked between pages 112 and 113 of a Spanish novel called One Hundred Years of Solitude.

The paper was old and yellow. When Sofia unfolded it carefully, she saw lines drawn in green ink â€” rivers, mountains, and trees. In the center was a circle with a single word written inside it: Encontrada.

"Found," Sofia whispered. She knew enough Spanish to translate that.

Her grandmother had been an archaeologist before she got sick. Abuela Elena had spent thirty years searching the Amazon rainforest for a city that most people said was just a legend. A city built by an ancient people who vanished five hundred years ago.
